32 namespace Mod {
34 class TAGLIB_EXPORT Properties : public AudioProperties
35 {
36 public:
37 Properties(AudioProperties::ReadStyle propertiesStyle);
38 ~Properties() override;
39
40 Properties(const Properties &) = delete;
41 Properties &operator=(const Properties &) = delete;
42
43 int bitrate() const override;
44 int sampleRate() const override;
45 int channels() const override;
46
47 unsigned int instrumentCount() const;
48 unsigned char lengthInPatterns() const;
49
50 void setChannels(int channels);
51
52 void setInstrumentCount(unsigned int instrumentCount);
53 void setLengthInPatterns(unsigned char lengthInPatterns);
54
55 private:
56 class PropertiesPrivate;
57 TAGLIB_MSVC_SUPPRESS_WARNING_NEEDS_TO_HAVE_DLL_INTERFACE
58 std::unique_ptr<PropertiesPrivate> d;
59 };
60 } // namespace Mod
61} // namespace TagLib
62#endif
